name_ru: Ретушь мастера перманента — Акцент на брови
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial skin retouch. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical. Eyelashes: absolutely protected — pixel-identical. Eyes, eyelids: no modification. Eyebrows: NO modification — this is PMU work showcase. Lip color: unchanged. SKIN: Professional retouch — clear even tone, natural glow. Remove minor blemishes. Preserve natural texture, pores, micro-details. Hydrated editorial highlights for depth and volume. [EXTRAS]. Add subtle natural microfreckles — delicate, barely noticeable, photorealistic. BACKGROUND: Solid beautiful [BG_COLOR]. QUALITY: No filters. Ultra-photorealistic editorial beauty. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not resize.
